short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opticsboss Extension created to delivered quality information to people interested in optics or Riflescopes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are various types of optics & scopes are available in the market. All of them come up with different feature & offers. If you are a beginner then finding the perfect scope for your rifle is an awful task.Then opticsboss Extension Helps to get the adequate information on all the facts that need to consider before choosing the right scope.


@ What You will get Here @

1. Helps to know how irritating it can be to choose the right product.
2. Delivered quality information to people interested in optics and rifle scopes.
3. Calculates the adjustments necessary to sight in a rifle scope using touch input For virtual target.

The App is currently only available in English, it will be available in other languages in upcoming releases.
